statements: DELETE FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE product_name = 'Organic Cotton T-Shirt';
DELETE FROM ProductLifeCycle WHERE product_name = 'Organic Cotton T-shirt';
DELETE FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE waste_production > 500 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM GreenSupplyChain WHERE supplier = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE product_id = 1 AND quantity >= 50;
DELETE FROM environmental_impact WHERE waste_generated < 2.5 OR carbon_footprint > 100.0;
